mapper.update: UPDATE theater SET saveFilename = #{saveFilename} WHERE tNum = #{tNum}
mapper.select: SELECT tNum, t.hallNo, sCount, name, location, seats, t.saveFilename, "rows", cols, generalSeat, vipSeat, hallName, f.saveFilename hallFile FROM theater t JOIN hall h ON t.hallNo = h.hNum JOIN hallFile f ON h.hNum = f.hNum WHERE t.hallNo = #{hallNo} ORDER BY tNum DESC
SELECT hNum hallNo, hallName FROM hall ORDER BY hallNo
